name: RESICRYL TH 460
description: RESICRYL TH 460 is a aqueous emulsion of acrylic polymers and these are universally used in paint formulations where fillers are present in large concentration. They are also used in clay coating formulations and printing inks and Acrylic dispersing agents are the salts of polymethacrylic acid and are effective suspending agents for inorganic fillers like titanium dioxide and calcium carbonate. These are universally used in paint formulations where fillers are present in large concentration. They are also used in clay coating formulations and printing inks.
